The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process
This area is exclusively for discussion of what various Monster Rancher games read off CDs.
We welcome new users/researchers.
Please read the section carefully before posting any messages.
We have been researching the topics here since 1999.
All posted data refers to the NTSC/NA version of the games.
Any unrelated posts will be deleted promptly.
